metadata.title: CVE-2018-19206 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
steps/mail/func.inc in Roundcube before 1.3.8 has XSS via crafted use of <svg><style>, as demonstrated by an onload attribute in a BODY element, within an HTML attachment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
roundcube-core - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.8+dfsg.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.8+dfsg.1-2').
